00037 #ifndef EGS_PYRAMID_
00038 #define EGS_PYRAMID_
00039 
00040 #include "egs_base_geometry.h"
00041 #include "egs_polygon.h"
00042 
00043 #ifdef WIN32
00044 
00045 #ifdef BUILD_PYRAMID_DLL
00046 #define EGS_PYRAMID_EXPORT __declspec(dllexport)
00047 #else
00048 #define EGS_PYRAMID_EXPORT __declspec(dllimport)
00049 #endif
00050 #define EGS_PYRAMID_LOCAL
00051 
00052 #else
00053 
00054 #ifdef HAVE_VISIBILITY
00055 #define EGS_PYRAMID_EXPORT __attribute__ ((visibility ("default")))
00056 #define EGS_PYRAMID_LOCAL  __attribute__ ((visibility ("hidden")))

00059 #define EGS_PYRAMID_LOCAL

00063 
00106 template <class T>
00107 class EGS_PYRAMID_EXPORT EGS_PyramidT : public EGS_BaseGeometry {
00108 
00109 protected:
00110 
00111     T             *p;   
00112     EGS_Vector    xo;   
00113     EGS_2DVector  xop;  
00114     EGS_Vector    a;    
00115     EGS_Float     d;    
00116     int           n;    
00117     EGS_Polygon   **s;  
00118     bool          open; 
00119 
00120 public:
00121 
00129     EGS_PyramidT(T *P, const EGS_Vector &Xo, bool O=true, const string &N="");
00130 
00131     ~EGS_PyramidT() {
00132         delete p;
00133         for(int j=0; j<n; j++) delete s[j]; delete [] s;
00134     };
00135 
00136     bool isInside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00137         EGS_Vector xp(x-xo); EGS_Float axp = a*xp;
00138         if( axp > 0 ) return false;
00139         //if( axp > -1e-10 ) return true;
00140         if( !open  && d + axp < 0 ) return false;
00141         EGS_Float t = -d/axp;
00142         //return p->isInside2D(xop+p->getProjection(xp)*t);
00143         return p->isInside2D(p->getProjection(xo + t*xp));
00144     };
00145 
00146     int isWhere(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00147         if( isInside(x) ) return 0; else return -1;
00148     };
00149     int inside(const EGS_Vector &x) { return isWhere(x); };
00150 
00151     int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00152             EGS_Float &t, int *newmed = 0, EGS_Vector *normal = 0) {
00153         int jhit=-1;
00154         if( ireg == 0 ) {
00155             int convex = p->isConvex();
00156             for(int j=0; j<n; j++) {
00157                 if( convex || s[j]->isInside2D(x) ) {
00158                   if(s[j]->isInside(x))
00159                     if( s[j]->howfar(true,x,u,t) ) jhit = j;
00160                 }
00161             }
00162             if( !open ) {
00163                 if( p->howfar(true,x,u,t) ) jhit = n;
00164             }
00165             if( jhit < 0 ) return ireg;
00166             if( newmed ) *newmed = -1;
00167             if( normal ) *normal = jhit < n ? s[jhit]->getNormal() :
00168                 p->getNormal();
00169             return -1;
00170         }
00171         for(int j=0; j<n; j++) {
00172             //bool in = s[j]->isInside(x) && s[j]->isInside2D(x);
00173             EGS_Float up = u*s[j]->getNormal(), xp = s[j]->distance(x);
00174             if( up > 0 && xp < 0 ) {
00175                 EGS_Float tt = -xp/up;
00176                 if( tt <= t && s[j]->isInside2D(x+u*tt) ) {
00177                     t = tt; jhit = j;
00178                 }
00179             }
00180         }
00181         if( !open ) {
00182             EGS_Float up = u*p->getNormal(), xp = p->distance(x);
00183             if( up > 0 && xp < 0 ) {
00184                 EGS_Float tt = -xp/up;
00185                 if( tt <= t && p->isInside2D(x+u*tt) ) {
00186                     t = tt; jhit = n;
00187                 }
00188             }
00189         }
00190         if( jhit < 0 ) return ireg;
00191         if( newmed ) *newmed = med;
00192         if( normal ) *normal = jhit < n ? s[jhit]->getNormal()*(-1) :
00193                                           p->getNormal()*(-1);
00194         return 0;
00195     };
00196 
00197     // TODO: optimize. this implementation is waaaay too slow.
00198     EGS_Float hownear(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x) {
00199         EGS_Float tperp = 1e30;
00200         for(int j=0; j<n; j++) {
00201             EGS_Float t = s[j]->hownear(true,x);
00202             if( t < tperp ) {
00203                 if( t <= 0 ) return 0; tperp = t;
00204             }
00205         }
00206         if( !open ) {
00207             EGS_Float t = p->hownear(true,x);
00208             if( t < tperp ) tperp = t;
00209         }
00210         return tperp;
00211     };
00212 
00213     const string &getType() const { return p->getType(); };
00214 
00215     void printInfo() const;
00216 
00217 };
00218 
00219 typedef EGS_PyramidT<EGS_PolygonYZ> EGS_PyramidX;
00220 typedef EGS_PyramidT<EGS_PolygonXZ> EGS_PyramidY;
00221 typedef EGS_PyramidT<EGS_PolygonXY> EGS_PyramidZ;
00222 typedef EGS_PyramidT<EGS_Polygon> EGS_Pyramid;
00223 
00224 #endif
